imdb.plot outline: Strap in and get ready to freak out -- we're taking an in-depth look at never-before-seen, cutting-edge technology that will soon be hitting amusement parks around the world. From behind-the-scenes action at the world's premiere amusement park expo to one of the biggest announcements in roller coaster history, we'll give you a front row seat to all the action!
imdb.title: Future Scream Machines: Bigger, Wetter, Faster
akas: Future Scream Machines: Bigger, Wetter, Faster (United States)
plot: Strap in and get ready to freak out -- we're taking an in-depth look at never-before-seen, cutting-edge technology that will soon be hitting amusement parks around the world. From behind-the-scenes action at the world's premiere amusement park expo to one of the biggest announcements in roller coaster history, we'll give you a front row seat to all the action!::Travel Channel
